mapper.insert: insert into quan_accounts_futures (id, exchange_id, user_id, state, accounts_type, accounts_name, access_key, secret_key) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{exchangeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update quan_accounts_futures set exchange_id = #{exchangeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accounts_type = #{accountsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accounts_name = #{accountsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_key = #{accessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, secret_key = #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, exchange_id, user_id, state, accounts_type, accounts_name, access_key, secret_key from quan_accounts_futures where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
